Potted Basil.notes: Keep soil consistently moist. Requires 6+ hours of direct sun.

Fiddle Leaf Fig.notes: Allow the top inch of soil to dry out between waterings. Avoid drafts.

Orchid.notes: Prefers bark or moss medium. Needs high humidity but good drainage.

Aloe Vera.notes: Drought tolerant. Allow soil to dry completely before watering deeply.

Spider Plant.notes: Easy to care for. Water when the top soil begins to feel dry.

Snake Plant.notes: Very tolerant of neglect. Overwatering is the biggest risk.

Peace Lily.notes: Loves humidity. Leaves droop dramatically when thirsty, signaling it needs immediate water.

Echeveria.notes: Needs extremely well-draining soil. Only water when soil is bone dry.

Boston Fern.notes: Requires consistently moist soil and high ambient humidity to thrive.
